title: Washington Police Officer’s Post-Jan. 6 Suicide Deemed Line-of-Duty Death
sub_head: Officer Jeffrey Smith wouldn’t have died if he hadn’t been injured during Capitol attack, D.C. board concludes
body:
The death by suicide of D.C. Metropolitan Police officer Jeffrey Smith days after the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the U.S. Capitol has been ruled a line-of-duty death.
The decision by a District of Columbia retirement board came after a monthslong fight by Mr. Smith’s widow, Erin Smith, who pushed officials to recognize her husband’s death as in the line of duty.
